name: Sachin Yadav
title: MERN Stack Developer
meta_description: Professional portfolio showcasing MERN stack expertise and projects
summary: As a results-driven MERN Stack Developer with over 4 years of experience, I excel at building and optimizing scalable web applications that deliver tangible results. My expertise spans secure API development (Node.js, Express.js), dynamic UI/UX (React.js, Redux), and efficient database management (MongoDB). I am passionate about crafting high-performing digital experiences that enhance user engagement and streamline operations.

about_meta_description: Learn more about my professional background, skills, and experience
about_subheading: Get to know more about my professional journey and expertise
about_me_paragraph1: A results-driven MERN Stack Developer with over 4 years of experience, specializing in building scalable web applications and optimizing performance.
about_me_paragraph2: Proven expertise in both frontend (React.js, Redux) and backend (Node.js, MongoDB) development, with a strong focus on secure API integrations and reusable components.
about_me_paragraph3: A collaborative team player and mentor skilled at delivering high-impact solutions in agile environments and driving efficiency.
about_exp_jio_description_1: During my tenure as a FullStack Developer at Jio Platforms Limited, I was responsible for designing and optimizing backend systems. I focused on creating secure CRUD APIs, implementing OAuth2.0 and RBAC, and developing a custom error code system that boosted efficiency and reliability.
about_exp_jio_description_2: During my tenure as a React Developer at Jio Platforms Limited, I designed and delivered high-performing web applications, including Jio Reels, by developing interactive dashboards and dynamic analytics features. I also played a crucial role in UI migration, code refactoring, and mentoring junior developers, ensuring robust and scalable solutions.
